name: Meiofauna monitoring in the Trieste harbour, northern Adriatic Sea (Port Authority), 2013 and 2015
description: Meiofauna monitoring in the Trieste harbour, NorthernAdriatic Sea (Port Authority), 2013 and 2015. In June2013 and March2015, sampling was carried out in theharbour of the Triesteport by a KC Haps bottomcorer with polycarbonate sample tubes (12.7 cm I.D. with a sample area of 127 cm2).In laboratory, one sedimentcore was subsampledby means of 3 cut-off plasticsyringes (2.7 cm I.D.,surface area of 5.72 cm2, 0-10cm top sediment)in order to obtain three pseudoreplicates forthe meiofauna. Meiofaunal organisms (38â1000 m) were extracted from sediment subsamples by sieving each pseudoreplicate and by centrifuging the material retained by a 38Î¼mmesh net with Ludox HS-40 (density of1.15â1.18 g cmâ3). All meiobenthic organisms were countedandtaxonomically classified to the main groups under a stereomicroscope(Olympus SZX12; final magnification of Ã 32-40)
